data.name: Pray Game
data.detailed_description:
Latest Release

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1419750/Apostle_Rebellion/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1342120/Castaway_of_the_Ardusta_Sea/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1989450/Public_Defense_Corp_The_Ambassador_of_Peace/


Upcoming Games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1724320/Noelle_Does_Her_Best/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1198850/How_to_Build_a_Magnificent_Kingdom/


About the Game

Arcee's a young woman in pursuit of learning magic. But one day, her family home was attacked and she was swept away to an isolated island.

In her possession is the Black Box, a magical device that absorbs mysterious energy from around her.

In order to discover what had happened to her and what her true identity is, she has decided to fight back against evil with the help of the kind island dwellers!

Features:

  • Classic RPG Experience
  • Turn-based Combat
  • Element Skill Tree
  • Multiple Endings
  • Multiple Difficulties
  • Fast Traveling
data.about_the_game:
Arcee's a young woman in pursuit of learning magic. But one day, her family home was attacked and she was swept away to an isolated island.

In her possession is the Black Box, a magical device that absorbs mysterious energy from around her.

In order to discover what had happened to her and what her true identity is, she has decided to fight back against evil with the help of the kind island dwellers!

Features:

data.short_description: A classic style turn-based RPG. Play as Arcee, a young woman who's home mysteriously gets teleported to an island. Now she works to discover what happened, and find her way back home.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
